display_long_description:
Step into Science World VR, where learning science is all about having fun!

Science World VR is an educational game that combines fun mini games with STEM learning to help players sharpen their skills. Learn chemistry, biology, physics, environmental science, and more in a fun new way!
With 7 engaging mini games and 3 immersive STEM experiences that are designed around molecules, circuits, human senses, physics, and more, you'll have a fun and immersive way to help sharpen your science skills. Who said improving your science knowledge couldn't be fun!

*Molecule Mixer
*Waste Organizer
*Sensory Target
*Rocket Circuit
*Hockey Montage
*Matter Catch
*True or Boss
*Sea n Sub Cleanup
*Close Encounters
*Motion Madness

Each mini-game and experience in Science World VR integrates key science concepts into enjoyable challenges. From mixing molecules and organizing waste, to battling monsters with gesture-drawn answers or piloting submarines through ocean cleanup missions, you're in for hours of educational fun!
